reviews.text: Okay, so it had seen better days, but staff were friendly, and the room was clean, and had a TV, air con and balcony.
reviews.title: I liked it a lot

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Downstairs was a small swimming pool, and the restaurant served nice enough food.
reviews.title: Good price for what you get in the area
